entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low zero with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
